kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Check popup and accept 1 only use now
Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=/hierarchy/android.widget.FrameLayout/android.widget.LinearLayout/android.widget.FrameLayout/android.widget.FrameLayout/android.view.ViewGroup/android.view.ViewGroup/android.view.ViewGroup[2]/android.view.ViewGroup/android.view.ViewGroup[2]/android.widget.TextView[1]' contains exactly text 'Your account waiting to verify'.

kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Please go to your email and verify your account.
